channel.title: Rid on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Rid on TLDRBins

item.title: NetExec (nxc)
item.description: Basic Commands # Single user and password nxc smb 10.10.11.10 -u <USER> -p <PASSWORD> # Single user and password (Active Directory) nxc smb -u <USER> -p <PASSWORD> -d <DOMAIN> -dc-ip <DC_IP> # Multiple users or passwords nxc smb -u usernames.txt -p <PASSWORD> -d <DOMAIN> -dc-ip <DC_IP> --continue-on-success # Match username to corresponding password nxc smb 10.10.11.10 -u usernames.txt -p passwords.txt --no-bruteforce --continue-on-success # With LM Hash:NT Hash nxc smb 10.
